flow

README file - search sql
search - someKey ex)number, atk, def
option - max 2 + search in result?
bt/bte/eq/lt/lte

-flow

choose search / insert / update / delete

--if search

input sql - parser
after parssing, display list

//using indexing? or not?

question 1.search in result 2.new search 3.quit search

if 2 or 3, drop search result

--if insert

number / name / etc

if number is absense - errormsg

--if update

input number
name / etc

--if delete

if number is absense - errormsg
